name: DengerousCards
description:
This game is made based on the game Donsol

Game rules:

There are three types of cards in the game:

Cards with type "Monster".
Cards with this type cause damage to the player, the amount of which is indicated in the lower left corner of the card. The game has two cards of this type with the following damage values: from 2 to 11, 13, 15, 17, 21.

Cards with the type "Shield".
The shield helps reduce the damage received from Monster cards. The Shield card has two values (1/2):
1 - how much the shield reduces the damage received from monster cards
2 - the shild durability of the shield.
On impact, the shield reflects the same amount of attack that is indicated on the shield card itself. If the strength of the shield is less than or equal to the attack of the monster - the shield breaks and the player takes full damage. If a card with the type "Shield was just taken in the hand, the strength index of such a card will not be determined and automatically becomes equal to the damage from the monster's attack. The game has single cards with values from 2 to 10, as well as 4 cards with a value of 11.

Cards with type "Potion".
Cards with the "Potion" type add health to the player. If a player uses two potions in a row, the effect is applied only from the first potion, the second a potion in this case, health does not regenerate. The game has single cards with values from 2 to 10, as well as 4 cards with a value of 11.
